definition: Tartar (various northern tribes in ancient China)/Tatar (Turkic ethnic group in central Asia)
Strait of Tartary between Sakhalin and Russian mainland

sentences.english: The questions arising round Zubu and Tatar may be called a puzzle of the last century.
sentences.chinese: 阻卜與韃靼之謎堪稱一道世紀難題。

sentences.english: Yedisan Tatars traded there in the 14th century.
sentences.chinese: 十四世紀，東歐的韃靼人在此從事貿易。

sentences.english: After the Tatars were defeated, Russia could turn against Sweden.
sentences.chinese: 在韃靼人被擊敗後，露西亞可以轉身對付瑞典。

sentences.english: The attack cleared the Tatars from the field, and continued the chase.
sentences.chinese: 這次襲擊從戰場上清除了韃靼人，並繼續追擊。

sentences.english: Tatars no longer dared attack the southern Russian border and in 1598 also made a peace with Russia.
sentences.chinese: 韃靼人再也不敢襲擊露西亞南部邊境。

sentences.english: In total, during the 16th century Crimean Tatars invaded Russia 91 times.
sentences.chinese: 16世紀期間，克里木韃靼入侵露西亞總共91次。

sentences.english: The Tartars employed another weapon, the so-called Chinese dragon belching fire.
sentences.chinese: 韃靼人使用了另一種武器，所謂中國龍噴火器。

sentences.english: Despite being sacked and burnt by the invading Tartars in the next century.
sentences.chinese: 儘管在十三世紀裏歷經了韃靼人入侵的劫掠和燒燬。

sentences.english: Sometimes also used the Pan- Tatar said all ethnic groups in northern China.
sentences.chinese: 有時也用韃靼泛稱中國北方各民族。

sentences.english: Tartar evolutions are indicated by flags which are lowered, like marine signals.
sentences.chinese: 韃靼人變陣是通過旗幟的降低來表示，就像海事信號。

sentences.english: During this period the Russian steak tartare was brought back to Germany and called "tartare steak."
sentences.chinese: 這個時候，德國人就把俄羅斯的韃靼牛排帶回了德國。

sentences.english: Steak tartare is really light it's like eating sushi.
sentences.chinese: 韃靼牛排是很清淡的食物，就像壽司一樣。

sentences.english: We went from the country of the Tartars into the country of those who curse the Moon.
sentences.chinese: 我們從韃靼來到了一個詛咒月亮的國度。
